name: Ratatosk Warlord
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: I'm Bigger That's Why
text: As a bonus action, the ratatosk warlord commands one ratatosk within 30 feet of it to make one melee attack as a reaction.

trait.name: Warlord Skitter
text: The ratatosk warlord can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The ratatosk warlord makes two attacks. one with its gore and one with its ratatosk shortspear.

action.name: Ratatosk Shortspear
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Gore
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) psychic damage.

action.name: Chatter of War (Recharges 5-6)
text: Each non-ratatosk creature within 30 feet that can hear the warlord must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on all attack rolls until the start of the warlord's next turn.
